pr_title: fix: [WIP] Add uid column in IncomingSms and OutboundSms

timeline.message: fix: Add API endpoints for listing sms and deletion
rename incoming sms service method parameter
add empty check for originator string
fix conflict and merge with master
fix: Add uid column in IncomingSms and OutboundSms
Add flyway script to add/update uid column

timeline.bodyText: I guess there can be a lot of SMS in a database, and this might be slow or lead to out of mem. We have a PSQL function for generating UIDs now I believe @stian-sandvold ? I would suggest we use that PSQL function instead to make this much faster and less prone to mem issues.
timeline.author: larshelge
